data.title: Great people and great store
data.text: Forget about the corporate surf and skate stores (ahem....Sun Diego across the street), and just go right to Witt's - a Carlsbad landmark!!  The staff, from Witt on down, is just ready to help.  From skateboards, suits and rentals, they have what you need!

data.title: SEX WAX
data.text: Bought a sex wax shirt there just like i used too have as a teenager in the 80s. Just a cool surf shop

data.title: Great surf shop!
data.text: The staff was very helpful and knew what they were talking about.  They seemed to really care about my family and getting them into wetsuits that fit (with some growing room).  They also helped us out with properly fitting them into the right surfboards.  My kids are past the beginning stages of surfing and are progressing.  They really put things into perspective for my kids about the size of board they should be riding vs. the size they thought they should be riding.  It was a huge benifit to their surfing.  Since then we have gone back and got them skateboards.  Again, the staff was friendly and knew how to get the best bang for our buck with all the skateboard accessories.  We love to support the local shops, esp. Carlsbad Pipelines.

data.title: Best surfshop in CBad..
data.text: This is the friendliest surf shop in San Diego. With plenty of surf and skate gear and clothing it packs a lot into a great location a block to the beach! Witt is a long time local surfer with great energy and very friendly. Many surf shops are not nearly as inviting as this one.

data.title: Best surfshop in CBad...
data.text: This is the friendliest surf shop in San Diego. With plenty of surf and skate gear and clothing it packs a lot into a great location a block to the beach! Witt is a long time local surfer with great energy and very friendly. Many surf shops are not nearly as inviting as this one.

data.title: It Has Everything
data.text: This is a great place to find all your beach needs. It has everythng from clothes to hats to shoes... It even has a fantastic rental program. They have all sorts of beach toys available. You'll find wetsuits, surfboards, skim boards, boogie boards and much more. Everyone that works there knows a lot about the area and is really friendly. A nice mom and pop shop.

data.title: fun place to visit
data.text: carlsbad pipelines isa great store to find what u need with good prices and great t shirts,if you are looking for something that you need,go to Carlsbad Pipelines.nice logo!!!!located next to Jays Pizza and Cold Stone Creamery.
